Position : Customer Value Specialist – Pune, IndiaLocation : PuneJob requisition no. : R0059367Sandvik Coromant is the world’s leading supplier of tools, tooling solutions and know-how for the metalworking industry. We believe that engineering is the lifeblood of society - developing, changing, molding and evolving our everyday lives. New opportunity awaits as we enter the future of manufacturing. And we want you to join us!
We are now looking for a curious, confident and business-oriented Customer Value center Manager for Pune, India location – someone who wants to ensure successful delivery of our world class premium Customer Experience, focusing on services for today, with the needs of tomorrow in mind. Are you that someone?ScopeProvides Business Support and Services with a consultancy approach to support the strategic planning of Front Line Sales and to strengthen and develop the customer relationship and loyalty over time. • Any activity has to be carried out according to the requirements of Quality Management System and Internal Sales & Marketing Playbook.This position will report to the Customer Value Manager – Pune. With strong integrity and a great ability to lead others, you are both capable and genuinely interested in managing and motivating teams and individuals in a virtual, cross-functional and global organization. You easily create an open and trusting environment, where commitment, collaboration and results are key drivers. Being a natural communicator with sincere customer focus, you interact successfully with all our stakeholders, and you embrace any opportunity to represent our business and shape a profitable marketing position. On top of this, you bring a structured and holistic approach as you work to execute strategies and meet our objectives.
At Sandvik Coromant, we believe that diversity of experience, perspective and background will lead to a better environment for our employees, our business and our customers, and we are looking forward to meeting you.Application
